From my brief try-on of them all, they seem well-made, and the styles aren't overly obnoxious, just simple and dainty. They also stack quite nicely as well!

I have worn it in the shower, while doing dishes, washing my hands, etc., and it hasn‚Äôt tarnished at all. I have super small wrists, so it is a little loose on me even though I have the XS size. title: Cubic Zirconia Hypoallergenic Stud Earrings for Women Men Girls Statement Cartilage Fashion Surgical Steel Helix Earrings 5 Pairs

reviews.name: brianna
reviews.review: I got this for my cousin who recently got her ears pierced. The guy who did them didnt know what he was doing, he gave her butterfly back earrings and didnt give her a bar long enough to cope with the swelling. We switched to different earrings and found out she was allergic to the "fake metal" in those earrings and the peircings started to reject. I found these and immediately knew that this is what she needed. The variety in the size if the diamonds also gave her the choice to pick what she actually wanted instead of the generic "this is what we have so this is what you get" most places offer. The flat backs were wide enough to keep her ears from basically absorbing them like they did the original piercing. And the bar was long enough that it helped with the swelling caused by the previous earring rejecting. In two weeks her ears were finally able to heal. The flat backs were also comfortable on her to sleep on while her ears were healing. Overall 10 out of 10 in my books

reviews.name: Christina Potter
reviews.reviewTitle: LOVE. LOVE. EVERYTHING I WAS LOOKING FOR
reviews.review: First of all, I didn‚Äôt expect them to come in cute little packaging, and it stays neat and organized. I hate when my earrings stab me in the middle of the night because they are too long and too sharp. These fit so snug but they are comfortable and can move/twist easily, which I love. The smallest size it the daintiest little gem and I have been searching for one this size. it‚Äôs quite literally perfect. Only downsize is my fingers literally get sweaty and slippery which makes putting the backs in so difficult LMAO. otherwise these are perfect.

reviews.name: Danae
reviews.review: I‚Äôve struggled with my ears rejecting peiercings my entire life. Ive went to order these a few times and thought I could tiff it out. NO. I finally did it and have not had a single flare up since!!! These are amazing. What I will say is they are a slightly bigger gauge than most earring holes‚Ä¶ at least mine. And while they are not getting infected I‚Äôm working on essentially ‚Äúresizing‚Äù my 3 lobe piercing. Other than that idk why I didn‚Äôt buy them sooner!!

reviews.name: Ashley
reviews.review: I have spent money on some websites that swear it‚Äôs make for sensitive ears. I can only wear those one maybe two days then my ears start to hurt. I‚Äôm on 2 weeks going strong with these earrings. When I take them off my ears don‚Äôt feel swollen or hurt. I took them off to just see how it would do putting them in the next morning; the hole was still opened didn‚Äôt have to force it open like the other ones would have done. Worth it ! Thank you thank you I have been searching all over for comfortable earrings !

reviews.name: Kimberly
reviews.review: So worth it!!! They‚Äôre amazing quality especially for the price. I‚Äôm only wearing the two smallest sizes but I love that I have the other options. I‚Äôve been sleeping in them since getting them and they‚Äôre incredibly comfortable. I also have really sensitive ears and I haven‚Äôt had a single issue. No redness, no pain, nothing. I genuinely couldn‚Äôt be happier with them!!

reviews.name: Aimster
reviews.review: For someone who has sensory issues these are great! I was starting to miss my earrings but had to put them in and take them out at night. I can‚Äôt stand the way regular earrings feel when trying to sleep or how they touch the pillow etc. I‚Äôve had these in since I‚Äôve gotten them and haven‚Äôt had to take them out. Im excited to get more colors!

reviews.name: Makenna
reviews.review: I absolutely love these earrings. They fit in my ear well. The only issue is the backs of mine do fall off a lot. I have lost 4 of the backs and I have only had them in about a week

reviews.name: Duane
reviews.reviewTitle: Rose Gold (B) isn't as vibrant as the picture! It's a very washed out.
reviews.review: Bought the Rose Gold (B) for my wife. She likes them but the one complaint is that they aren't as vibrant as the picture. They are slightly Rose Gold. I had to shine a light to actually see the full color because at first I thought they sent me the regular Gold (C). Other than that they are great.

reviews.name: Dani
reviews.reviewTitle: Love these earrings! Flatback labrets for life!
reviews.review: These earrings are fantastic, this is the 5mm and 3mm I have in. My ears have always been very easily irritated and I have had these in 24/7 for 3 weeks and not an ounce of irritation. They are also extremely comfortable to sleep in because they are flatbacks. The back unscrews rather than the front so they are easy to put in.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review:
For the price, I wasn't expecting much. But these are actually really lovely! They're well made, strong and secure, the gem is very sparkly. There's a good variety of different sizes.
I've used two pairs so far (in 2+ months) and slept, showered, exercised etc with them in. There's been no discolouration and the screw end has stayed tight!
They are quite fiddly to get the back on, so don't do it in a rush or when you're stressed. But worth it when they're in and you don't have to worry about them again for a while!

reviews.name: MissPRae
reviews.review:
I have worn this in my ears now for months (four earrings). No issues with the backs coming off and I wear them in bed and showers.

I do not recommend these if you intend to take them out daily as the backs are fiddly

Some of the backs I received did not work and the threading had gone so they spun and did not tighten.

You have to screw them on at the right angle or they won't stay on. Once out on correctly they don't budge.

As you get so many for the price I feel it's very good and a couple of backs not working did not bother me as majority did.

Also they look expensive and I have no reaction. I am severely allergic to nickle and no reaction at all to these so very happy

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: I love these earrings, I have very sensitive ears , I can only wear sterling silver or 9ct gold, I got these earrings as it said surgical steel and hypoallergenic, said I'd give them a go I have them in my ears nearly a week and I am not allergic to them. And I can also sleep with them in and they don't jag me as they have screw back on.

reviews.name: Jon Bridges
reviews.review:
Bought this for my girlfriend, her words...
I have been suffering with infected ears for years. I stopped wearing any and as a result my earring holes had to be pushed through every time I wanted to wear some. I needed a solution to keep the earring holes open but without infection and this product really delivered. I have been wearing them for weeks now and no infection. Popping them in for the first time was a bit fiddly but it is true that you are better off doing it without the mirror. I tighten them once in a while but they stay put even so I shower everyday, had several pool days and work out 5-6 days a week.

It is attached to a holder that is much smaller than the box which allows the necklace to bounce around in the box. I found a piece of packing from a necklace box of mine and used it in the box to hold the necklace in place. At this price point I think a nice presentation in the box isn‚Äôt too much to expect.
